EmailTemplate.name: 202104_APAC_ATR_HGT1700_Webinar_Teams.Thank you for attending
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending our webinar! Hello, {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}
Thank you for attending our HGT1700 Conference. For your convenience, you can access the recorded event here <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/x69tW6FfXpkbqwrdDRhpcz]]>, should you like to view it again.
In addition, we would like your feedback to see how we are doing. Please use the following survey link: click here <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=JuXsln2csEiNr4uTyQpdGLyQkC5esnRCqYq-RbFOG3lUNUFaRVU2NjBJQTdRNjJIMUhGR0xKUUhVQi4u]]>.
Thank you, Global Tech Ops Team WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/x69tW6FfXpkbqwrdDRhpcz]]>
